summary: approaches the 3rd person camera during combat, for more comfortables and precises fights!
descriptionHtml:
approaches the 3rd person camera during combat, for more comfortables and precises fights!

=INSTALLATION=
Open:   C:\\Users\\[USERNAME]Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim
and edit Skyrim.ini with the notepad.

Add this lines at the bottom of the text:

**UPDATE 1.2 - Definitively approached the camera during combat**

[Camera]
fOverShoulderCombatAddY=-25.0000
fOverShoulderCombatAddZ=10.0000

**UPDATE 1.1 - Optimized the camera for stealth mode and when using range attacks**

[Camera]
fOverShoulderCombatAddY=-50.0000
fOverShoulderCombatPosZ=10.0000

**VERSION 1.0**

[Camera]
fOverShoulderCombatAddY=-50.0000
fOverShoulderCombatPosZ=-7.0000


Save and try the game! Remember to see my screenshots to look the difference!
author: Alfx3
